mapper.update:
update Feedback
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
phone_no = #{phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update Feedback set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone_no = #{phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delete_sign = #{deleteSign,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from Feedback where delete_sign = 0
and user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and phone_no like CONCAT('%', #{phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and content like CONCAT('%', #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
order by id desc
limit #{offset, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageSize, jdbcType=INTEGER}
